Class CELL

  • java.lang.Object
    • CELL

  • public class CELL
extends java.lang.Object
    CELL class represents each block in the grid and contains values which tells its maximum capacity of holding spheres and thier rotation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CELL(int x, int y, int i, int j)
      this is constructor of CELL which sets up stability of cells according to their position in grid and also set up rectangle of cell

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void masterListener()
      Will increment totolOrbs of players and also totalorbs of current players and will call CellmouseListener then and after doing this next player turn will come by calling Grid.turnPlayer()
      boolean move() 
      void reset()
      to reset the cell that is set its mass to be zero and make all spheres invisible
      void setSphere(int n)
      depending on the value of n it will set no.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CELL

        public CELL(int x,
            int y,
            int i,
            int j)
        this is constructor of CELL which sets up stability of cells according to their position in grid and also set up rectangle of cell
        Parameters:
        x - x is row number of cell in grid
        y - y is column number of cell in grid
        i - is the width of cell
        j - is the height of cell

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        to reset the cell that is set its mass to be zero and make all spheres invisible

      • setSphere

        public void setSphere(int n)
        depending on the value of n it will set no. of spheres visible and start their rotation if n is 0, make all spheres invisible if n is 1, make 1 sphere visible if n is 2, make 2 spheres visible and start vibration, similar is the case with n = 3 also set the color of spheres according to the playerId of cell
        Parameters:
        n - n is the current mass value

      • masterListener

        public void masterListener()
        Will increment totolOrbs of players and also totalorbs of current players and will call CellmouseListener then and after doing this next player turn will come by calling Grid.turnPlayer()

      • move

        public boolean move()
        Returns:
        does not matter here. doesn't signifies anything important this function is recursively call by Grid.burstMode2() for all the neigbours of its calling cell this function in turn will behave similarly as Cellmouselistener
